DESCRIPTION:
3 cent land with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1250 square feet north-Facing house, sparingly used home, located in menamkulam, kazhakottom, trivandrum. Perfect for families with comfort and serene living.

Key features:
Location: Prime residential area with easy access to highways, top-Rated schools, and colleges in the neighborhood. Beaches and shopping centers are close by.

Security: Gated community with 24/7 security for peace of mind.
Other features: Covered car porch24-Hour water supply.
 
This is a beautiful home, close to most conveniences and landmarks. Techno park is only 10 minutes (4km) away. Lulu mall, tvm, is only 20 minutes away (8 km), the international airport in tvm is only 22 minutes away (13.5 km), vizhinjam sea port, tvm is 40 minutes away (30km)
